author: Holly Ellyatt
title: Merkel says 'things will remain hard for a very long time' as pandemic is still at the beginning
description: German Chancellor Angela Merkel has said the end of the coronavirus pandemic is not yet in sight and that we will have to live with the virus "for a long time."
content:
German Chancellor Angela Merkel said the end of the coronavirus pandemic is not yet in sight and that we will have to live with the virus "for a long time."
